PlansByContinent.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/home_plansbycontinent` WHERE Continent is not null and trim(Continent) <> ' ';

PlansByCountry.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/home_plansbycountry` WHERE Country is not null and trim(Country) <> ' ';

PlansByLabel.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/home_plansbylabel` WHERE Label is not null and trim(Label) <> ' ';

CountryByContinent.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/home_countrybycontinent` WHERE Country is not null and trim(Country) <> ' ';

LabelByContinent.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/home_labelbycontinent` WHERE Label is not null and trim(Label) <> ' ';
